duties_responsibilities.duty: Coach 3rd shift production support members to deliver continuous improvement in safety, food safety/quality, cost of goods manufactured, customer service, member development etc.
Learn and understand the shipping, receiving, material staging, inventory, and meat inspection processes at Meadowside and train and coach Members on those processes.
Be responsible for the performance, productivity, and efficient utilization of resources.
Create an environment for ownership where each person wants to be responsible and transfer ownership of the work to the members who do the work.
Participate/facilitate in daily meetings and lead projects.
Be responsible for the crewing and scheduling of members as well as verifying timecards for accuracy.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s Degree or B.S. Degree in Supply Chain, Business, Engineering, Meat or Food Science, or a related field, preferred. Candidates without a Bachelor’s Degree and/or an Associate’s Degree must be willing to continue their education.
